sentences.en: A skein of duck came across, gabbling softly to themselves.
sentences.cn: 一群鸭子走过来, 相互轻轻地低声而鸣.

sentences.en: Correlation is negative at the 0.05 level with Filament size and Skein ratio.
sentences.cn: 含胶率和伸长率与茧丝纤度在0.5的水平上具有的负相关性.

sentences.en: Doctors discovered the hematoma by using a special computer X - ray called a " ket - skein ".
sentences.cn: 医生们使用了一种叫 “ 铜束 ” ( ket -skein)的特别的电脑x光机,检查出了脑血肿的准确位置.

sentences.en: Electronic single strand strength tester, yarn twist tester, skein yarn tester, ect.
sentences.cn: 拥有电子单纱强力机 、 纱线捻度仪 、 缕纱测试仪等国内外先进检测设备.

sentences.en: Lately, there has been a skein of such dangerous discoveries, one with deadly consequences.
sentences.cn: 最近, 那里有了连串如此危险的发现, 导致一人丧生的后果.

sentences.en: She passed me a skein of wool.
The packaging varies from DIN 160 size to wooden skein reels.
sentences.cn: 包装规格可从DIN160中的尺寸至木衬套轴.

sentences.en: This skein of wool won't disentangle.
Used for testing breaking tenacity and elongation at break of raw silk in skein and bobbin.
sentences.cn: 用于测定绞装和筒装生丝的断裂强度及断裂伸长率.

trans.tran_cn: （纱、线等）一绞，（飞行中的雁等）一群，混乱一团，一团糟
trans.tran_en: a long loosely wound piece of thread, wool, or  yarn
